Articles.Content:
That's Spelljammer, not Spellstopper. All the Trident names besides Trident herself come from literature.

That's where I've heard Thunder child from. War of the worlds.

That reminds me to build my warship.

Are boats designed to ram other ships allowed?

10-Ramming is disallowed.

Page 1. Rule 10

That's where I've heard Thunder child from. War of the worlds.

That reminds me to build my warship.

Are boats designed to ram other ships allowed?

Sadly, no British torpedo rams allowed.
The unsc infinity likes to ram other ships. Alien ships with shields.

The unsc infinity likes to ram other ships. Alien ships with shields.

Since ramming is disallowed, the UNSC will have to fall back on their dubstep guns. unsc unsc unsc

Here's my first armed craft, the 'Draco' light attack craft. Please tell me any flaws with the design and i will do my best to correct them

P.S. in the picture all six missiles had been used in target practise.

screenshot11.png
sorry about my last post im new to the forums, anyway heres the light craft i was talking about feel free to suggest improvements.

Here's my first armed craft, the 'Draco' light attack craft. Please tell me any flaws with the design and i will do my best to correct them

P.S. in the picture all six missiles had been used in target practise.

screenshot11.png

Interesting design
after the picture i edited it a bit (it had no oxidizer so i had to use hyper edit to get it to orbit) but it still looks fairly similar, im working on a large(ish) ship to add to my pitiful fleet:)

after the picture i edited it a bit (it had no oxidizer so i had to use hyper edit to get it to orbit) but it still looks fairly similar, im working on a large(ish) ship to add to my pitiful fleet:)

You can extend the range by using nuclear rockets. That will increase the mass and size slightly, but will make it more effective in combat.

The 'Draco' from behind with missiles and slightly different design.

I'll be sure to try nuclear rockets, or perhaps strapping it to a rocket somehow.

You can see Duddin Kerman there massively enjoying the experience

"Board"? Try planking.

Why Wood I do that ?
*Badum tiss*

Spartwo, how is the Thor class coming

also did you and zeke give up on your co-op ship?

I think it stopped at the one I put up. I don't think it was going well.

-Part count was over 500.

-Mass was 50% higher than intended.

-Hanger stopped being a thing.

-TWR was low.

-The amount of weapons for a Scythe weight ship was low.

-Insides were empty.

overall I doubt it's good enough to submit let alone keep. It's gone the way of most ships I build.

EDIT:Thor is coming along slowly as it's hard to be accurate when the video has recently been downgraded to 240p. I'm basing it of screenshots which don't give an all round view.

I think it stopped at the one I put up. I don't think it was going well.

-Part count was over 500.

-Mass was 50% higher than intended.

overall I doubt it's good enough to submit let alone keep. It's gone the way of most ships I build.

Ok well I don't have time to battle anyone, so Im going to battle myself. Set up a few hanland ships and my own.
I feel like re-enacting the Battle Of Lathe once the Thor class is finished.

I feel like re-enacting the Battle Of Lathe once the Thor class is finished.

If you can wait for two weeks I can do that with you.

It would be for fun, not ranking.

Who would you want to be?
I'll definitely be done the Thor by then.

I'll definitely be done the Thor by then.
